articles.title: VNL: Yuji Nishida lights it up as Japan triumphs over Argentina
articles.description: Yuji Nishida and Japan turned back a slow start and carved a huge four-set win over Olympic bronze medalist Argentina
articles.content: Japan turned back a slow start and carved a huge four-set win over Olympic bronze medalist Argentina, 27-25, 25-18, 17-25, 25-16, to take its second straight win in the 2022 FIVB Volleyball Nations League, Tuesday evening at the SMART Araneta Coliseu... [2516 chars]

articles.title: Who is Enzo Fernandez? Wolves chief 'arrives' in Argentina to discuss transfer
articles.description: Latest Wolves news from BirminghamLive includes the lowdown on Argentine midfielder Enzo Fernandez
articles.content:
Wolverhampton Wanderers are reportedly lining up a move for highly-rated River Plate midfielder Enzo Fernandez.
According to multiple news sources in Argentina, Wolves’ scouting chief Mathew Hobbs is due to arrive in the country to discuss the transf... [2811 chars]

articles.title: Argentina’s Tévez signs coaching deal with Rosario Central
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Carlos Tévez was hired Tuesday as coach of top-tier Argentine club Rosario Central after announcing his retirement as a player ear...
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Carlos Tévez was hired Tuesday as coach of top-tier Argentine club Rosario Central after announcing his retirement as a player earlier this month.
Both Rosario Central and Tévez confirmed the move on social media. The club tweeted... [637 chars]

articles.title: Legends take charge of Lebanon as Cheika forced to watch from afar
articles.description: Michael Cheika will watch his first match in charge of Lebanon from Argentina after flight cancellations forced him to hand over the reins for Wednesday night’s international against Malta to his star studded coaching team.
articles.content: Michael Cheika will watch his first match in charge of Lebanon from Argentina after flight cancellations forced him to hand over the reins for Wednesday night’s clash with Malta to his coaching team of Matt King, Jake Friend, Robbie Farah and Michael... [3190 chars]

articles.title: FIFA World Cup 2022 Power Rankings: Argentina rise; England slide down contender list; knockouts await USMNT?
articles.description: Brazil remain our top ranked side in a South America one-two as the countdown to Qatar 2022 rolls on
articles.content: At long last, the 32 nations that will compete at the 2022 FIFA World Cup are set. Wales, Costa Rica and Australia became the final three teams to book their Qatar berths earlier this month, setting the stage for the greatest competition in the sport... [8115 chars]

articles.title: Canada claims silver in U-18 Americas Championship, loses basketball final to U.S.
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina — Canada will return home from the Under-18 women's Americas Championship with a silver medal, but there were moments on Sunday when the basketball squad looked like it had a chance to upset the powerhouse U.S. squad.
